extendedInfo.description: Canada Postâs Mobile App gives you access to the most popular tools on canadapost.ca!Track a Package:Check the delivery status of your items. Simply type in your tracking number or use your camera to scan the barcode from a delivery slip / delivery notice card! You can choose to name your item (e.g. Momâs package)âmaking it easier to monitor multiple deliveriesâand keep a history of all your tracked items in a self-managed list.epostSecurely receive, manage, pay and store your bills, statements, pay stubs and notices with the convenience of a single login.  Your secure digital mailbox provides you with email or texts when new mail arrives, organized file folders and 7 years free storage. VaultYour online personal safety deposit box that lets you access, share and store whatâs important to you.  With bank-grade security and encryption, you'll never have to worry about anyone accessing your important information unless you want them to.Find a Postal Code: Look up a postal code to make sure your cards and packages are addressed correctly, even for rural and PO Box addresses. Save postal codes to your address book for easy retrieval.Find a Rate:Find out what it costs to send a parcel, letter or document within Canada or worldwide.Find a Post Office:Locate a Post Office near you, or anywhere in Canada.Picture Postageâ¢ â Postcards:Turn your photos into printed postcardsâwith delivery anywhere in the world for just $2.45 per card! Take a photo or select one from your camera roll, choose the recipient(s) from your contacts list and write your personal message. Weâll print, stamp and mail the postcard to each person on your list! Picture Postageâ¢ â Stamps:Create personalized stamps for your letters and invitations. Get started by taking a picture or access any photos that you have stored on your camera roll!For any feedback or questions around the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca

reviews.title: Postcard feature crashes app
reviews.comment: When trying to create a postcard on my Nexus 4, the app crashes every time.
reviews.author: Matthew Jurkowski

reviews.title: Excellent Program
reviews.comment: You really have made things quite easy for me to follow my package right to my door. I truly appreciate the fine job, keep it up. Thanks Alfred
reviews.author: Alfred Cole

reviews.title: Could be much better
reviews.comment: They should really try to get all mailers/creditors to sign up with them first before advertising that are the one stop shop. The app itself needs to be more user friendly when it comes to updating account info or removing old mailers.  Waiting for an update to give it a better rating; hopefully!
reviews.author: Esther Larbie

reviews.title: Awesome App !!
reviews.comment: What a great app. Very handy to be able to track multiple orders on my mobile ! That\'s right Peter, it DOES track multiple items.  Great job guys!
reviews.author: Cole J.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: All functions work great including the barcode scanner.
reviews.author: Elaine Bedard

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very accurate and useful.  Best app for tracking orders :)
reviews.author: Sharon Wong

reviews.title: Map issue
reviews.comment: When you browse locations, the map suddenly shifts to another place.
reviews.author: Si Tang

reviews.title: Postcards, cards and stamps
reviews.comment: This app crashes every time I try and create a custom postcard on both my Samsung Note 8.0 and Galaxy SII X phone. This is after it takes 5 minutes to load the card design, if it loads the design options at all!
reviews.author: Kyle Ingram

reviews.title: Good app. One suggestion.
reviews.comment: Great app that does what it\'s intended to do. My only suggestion is to send a notification when the shipping status of an item changes.
reviews.author: Chris Dolmeth

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Its not bad works better than other mailing apps
reviews.author: Daniel B.

reviews.comment: Works for what I need it for, but needs tablet support!
reviews.author: Nicholas Couffin

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. Tracked my parcel coming in. It told me the first day I got my tracking number that it would arrive Friday. Even said when it was in the truck being delivered! And sure enough, a few hours later I was signing for it. Heck, I could even go back and view the signature of whoever signed for it (which was me.) Really great app!
reviews.author: david stoeterau

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: On blackberry you can delete an order. Now I have one that\'s been delivered for a week and there\'s no delete in the menu. Lazy programming
reviews.author: S. Murphy

reviews.title: Its ok.
reviews.comment: It will get full five stars when it adds the barcode scanner in the track package section like it has in the iphone version.
reviews.author: Dwaipayan Sinha

reviews.title: Good tracking package..
reviews.comment: But the data is stored in the cache which gets cleared when my cache cleaner runs. The data should be stored permanently.
reviews.author: Don Vaillancourt

reviews.title: Not good enough!
reviews.comment: Will not allow to track more than one item. If the first tracking # is not in the system,  the program prevents me from proceeding to track another #.
reviews.author: Peter Hugh

reviews.title: No barcode scanning on Android
reviews.comment: App works well for tracking, minus 2 stars because barcode scanning only works on iOS.
reviews.author: Mike McIntosh

reviews.title: Great for multiple packages
reviews.comment: Works as advertised
reviews.author: Steve Girot

reviews.title: Tracking functionally doesn\'t work for me
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t accept valid domestic Canada Post tracking number formats that work fine on the website tracking page.
reviews.author: Kuribo Danu

reviews.title: Fail - crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes when i try to customize on my Samsung Galaxy.
reviews.author: Steve Cullen
